dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2447 IS: To amend title 31, United States Code, to clarify the use of credentials by enrolled agents.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Portman introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to clarify the use of credentials by enrolled agents.

section.text: Section 330 of title 31, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsections (b), (c), and (d) as subsections (c), (d), and (e), respectively, and
by inserting after subsection (a) the following new subsection:

subsection.text: Any enrolled agents properly licensed to practice as required under rules promulgated under subsection (a) shall be allowed to use the credentials or designation of enrolled agent, EA, or E.A..
